transArray.content: Very, very good, the service attitude is very good, and the room hygiene is also very satisfactory

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your satisfaction is our greatest encouragement and support. The welcome gifts carefully prepared by the hotel for you carry our most sincere greetings and expectations for you. We are committed to providing every guest with meticulous, thoughtful, warm and considerate services. We strive to make every guest happy to become a repeat customer. The hotel is located at Gate 2 East of Badili Automobile Park. Take Metro Line 6 and exit from Haidian Wuluju Station. It takes 3-5 minutes to walk directly to the hotel. Parking is free and there are ample parking spaces. Please report your license plate number to the front desk for verification electronically. Vouchers. Looking forward to meeting you again. I wish you a happy life. Manager: Zhang Minghui
